description:
Hiroko Yamashita is a childhood friend of http://anidb.net/ch13446 [Yuki Saiko].
She appears only as photograph (with her name in roumaji, no kanji) on a screen of the http://anidb.net/ch25714 [AMP] office when her death is reported in the TV news.
She was part of the http://anidb.net/ch25796 [YLEM project] and escaped from the laboratory together with her friends Yuki and http://anidb.net/ch25792 [Lisa].
name: Hiroko Yamashita
